attributes.action: MAKE ICELAND  PAY US OUR MONEY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a saver with Icesave Bank why are your British tax payers not allowed the same rights as the icelanders ie they are allowed to take there money out we are not . How can you and the F S A allow this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
